pkgmetadata.longdescription: Chacko Test for Order-Restriction with Permutation // Implements an extension of the Chacko chi-square test for ordered vectors (Chacko, 1966, https://www.jstor.org/stable/25051572). Our extension brings the Chacko test to the computer age by implementing a permutation test to offer a numeric estimate of the p-value, which is particularly useful when the analytic solution is not available.
